 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲיָם‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** dubious, possibly ==glow== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> to ***thirst***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***thirst, internal heat***), si vera lectio (so [[BDB#Du|Du]]; on form compare [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xxxvii (1883), 526</sup>); — construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּעְיָם רוּחוֺ‎</span> [[Isa.11.15|Isa 11:15]], read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעֹצֶם‎</span> (so apparently [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]]) [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Luz|Luzz]] [[BDB#Krochm|Krochm]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Gu|Gu]]<sup>Kau</sup> [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Perles|Perles]]<sup>Anal. 52</sup>.
